__e: Look carefully, we'll rush out of Temple Street tomorrow and challenge the world!
I can't challenge the devil to be a nice boyfriend contest.
When you reach beyond this existence, as you're about to, you are tempting fate.
You have flouted the rules of society all your life.
Defying orders is never the right thing to do.
You know, I don't want to go against the doctors, When you have panic attack, you believe on your doctor but I believed in the Gerson Therapy more. And I went for it.
The idea of even making contact with another human being is like trying to defy gravity.
All: * I think I'll try defying gravity *
Really, after all I did with Ms. defying gravity?
Cheating death once wasn't enough for him?
I think for the chance to defeat death and disease-- to let everyone on this earth have the chance of life-- sustained, healthy life-- to allow people to love each other, to be together forever--
Eventually, the best way to cheat death will be to create life.
You could've called my bluff and walked away anytime.
No, you made a choice to defy me and to back them.
Do you think you can defy him and not pay the price?
